entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `JsonPropertyInfo.AttributeProvider` is null when using `JsonSerializerContext` #96387
  • Expression.Compile(preferInterpretation: true) invokes inner lambda when a method is called on it #96385
  • Using Raylib APIs in Blazor WebAssembly #96384
  • Vector128 invalid code generation with tiered compilation in Release #96381
    8.0.x
  • [ARM64] `CINC` or at least `CSEL` not emitted for conditional increment #96380

Closed

  • VB.NET cannot AOT compile into DLL. I hope to add exported DLL dynamic library and ACTIVEX DLL. #96379
  • CG2-specific failure in JIT/Intrinsics/TypeIntrinsics_r.csproj and TypeIntrinsics_ro.csproj #96336
    9.0.0
  • Enable versioning bubbles that span multiple assemblies #10477
    Future
  • StackTracePreserveTests test fails #11213
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix hwintrinsicChild->isContained() assert #96388
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Experiment: Minopts lsra #96386
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Fix copy&paste bug in ReadyToRun_TypeGenericInfoMap::HasConstraints #96358
    area-ReadyToRun-coreclr
  • Update official windows queue to vs preview to match public #94887
    area-Infrastructure
  • JIT: Set `bbFalseTarget` upon `BBJ_COND` initialization/modification #96265
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Allow preinitializing `AppContext.TryGetSwitch` #95948
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Don't rely on inlining observations if VM doesn't allow that #96373
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement remaining ILGenertorImpl methods, excluding scope. Add max stack calculation for branching. #96362
    area-System.Reflection.Emit

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor Standalone Webassembly - Has no way to call Azure B2C edit profile user flow #53084
  • How to bind a complex string type to Checkbox in Blazor? #53083
  • How to create custom metadata provider in .net core? #53082
  • [Blazor WASM] Upgrading project to .NET 8 and breaks [Authorize] Attribute #53075

Closed

  • www:Masikin Arjuna.com #53076

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `76bb2af` to `dddb219` #53079
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • [release/2.1] (deps): Bump modules/EntityFrameworkCore from `74055e1` to `69f4ccb` #53078
    area-infrastructure, 2.1.x
  • [release/7.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `76bb2af` to `dddb219` #53077
    area-infrastructure, 7.0.x

Updated

  • Allow user to specify antiforgery request token source #51962
    community-contribution, feature-mvc-antiforgery, pending-ci-rerun, area-ui-rendering
  • [release/8.0] Fix SSR page rendering intermediate state instead of the end state of components #52943
    Servicing-consider, area-blazor, 8.0.x

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Windows 11 Email cannot identify the default mail app. #19643
  • [graphics] PlatformCanvas.DrawImageCallback throws System.NullReferenceException when using ImagePaint on Mac/iOS #19642
  • Deploy from windows visual studio to Apple device appicon and splashscreen problem #19640
  • On android, collectionview items cannot be selected. #19639

Closed

  • ViewHandler mapper extension methods won't reliably fire if mapper methods are replaced #6429
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • [Hosting] Register ImageSource services as KeyedServices #19641
    community ✨

Updated

  • Improves performance on BindableProperty #17756
    area/Xaml </>, community ✨, stale, Under Consideration
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #19577
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
